did.unittitle: Judge William B. Groat Labor Day Convocation Speech Audio-Visual Materials, 1975
did.repository: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Audio recording of the Labor Day Convocation on 9/1/1975 with Judge Groat

bioghist.p: Judge William B. Groat (1899-1986) served as counsel to the New York State Joint Legislative Committee on Industrial and Labor Relations, where he played a pivotal role in founding the ILR School and drafting its charter.

accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.
